_description: Phase A validation baseline - 3 simple molecules
_scope: Phase A uses only methane, ethane, and benzene to validate perfect pipeline execution with minimal conformational complexity. This is the smoke test for the entire system.

success_criteria._comment: Phase A requires perfect execution (100% success for all criteria). min_success_rate measures overall pipeline success (CREST+MOPAC complete). min_hof_extraction_rate measures HOF value extraction success. min_baseline_pass_rate measures whether extracted HOF matches expected baseline within tolerance.
